page.title: 04FARMING.
page.content: Average size of farm is{375}acres; average size field _{17}acres. Farms are arable with some stock. Cattle are free of disease but many get T.B. & Brucellosis. Sheep may get foot rot; crops _ fungal diseases. Livestock are fed on hay and straw in winter, grass in the summer and turnips in Autumn;sugar beet pulp in the feed all year round. The soil in this area is light loamy sand. This has to be limed regularly and is short of potash.Sugar_beet, peas, beans and oil seed rape are used as break crops. Most animals are bought.{Norwich}is the nearest cattle market. The main issues tied up with farming in the 1980's are overproduction tied up with conservation and{E.E.C. subsidies.
